mapper.select: SELECT F_GUID,F_MKBH,F_MKMC,F_CSS_CLASS,F_XTBH,F_SHOWLEFTMENUS FROM ES_HOME_MODULE where F_XTBH=#{xtbh} ORDER BY CAST(F_SORT as SIGNED) ASC
SELECT F_GUID,F_MKBH,F_MKMC,F_CSS_CLASS,F_XTBH,F_SHOWLEFTMENUS FROM ES_HOME_MODULE where F_XTBH=#{xtbh} ORDER BY CAST(F_SORT as SIGNED) ASC

SELECT P.F_GUID,P.F_GNBH,P.F_GNMC,P.F_CSS_CLASS,P.F_URL,P.F_MX,F_MKGUID,case when P.F_PGNBH is null or P.F_PGNBH = '' then F_MKGUID else F_PGNBH end F_PGNBH ,P.F_HIDE,P.F_JS,P.F_SORT,P.F_FULLSCREEN_TYPE,P.F_OPEN_TYPE,P.F_PARAMS,F_TABCLOSEABLE FROM ES_GNZD P where 1 = 1
AND (${limitSQL})
AND F_HIDE = "0" ORDER BY P.F_SORT ASC

SELECT F_GUID,F_GUID as F_GNBH,F_MKMC as F_GNMC,F_CSS_CLASS,'' as F_URL,0 as F_MX,F_GUID F_MKGUID,'' as F_PGNBH,F_SHOWLEFTMENUS as F_HIDE,0 as F_JS,F_SORT,'' as F_FULLSCREEN_TYPE, '' as F_OPEN_TYPE,'' as F_PARAMS,'' as F_TABCLOSEABLE FROM ES_HOME_MODULE where F_XTBH=#{xtbh} and F_SHOWLEFTMENUS = '1' ORDER BY CAST(F_SORT as SIGNED) ASC

SELECT P.F_GUID,P.F_GNBH,P.F_GNMC,P.F_CSS_CLASS,P.F_URL,P.F_MX,F_MKGUID,case when P.F_PGNBH is null or P.F_PGNBH = '' then F_MKGUID else F_PGNBH end F_PGNBH ,P.F_HIDE,P.F_JS,P.F_SORT,P.F_FULLSCREEN_TYPE,P.F_OPEN_TYPE,P.F_PARAMS,F_TABCLOSEABLE FROM ES_GNZD P where 1 = 1
AND (${limitSQL})
and F_MKGUID = (SELECT f_guid FROM es_home_module where F_MKBH = '1default') AND F_HIDE = "0" ORDER BY P.F_SORT ASC
